sqlExec:
update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"O ","tC":"v","rL":[],"pr":true},{"sq":1,"T":"presbítero ","tC":"v","rL":["G4245"]},{"sq":2,"T":"à ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":3,"T":"senhora ","tC":"v","rL":["G2959"]},{"sq":4,"T":"eleita ","tC":"v","rL":["G1588"]},{"sq":5,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":6,"T":"aos ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":7,"T":"seus ","tC":"v","rL":["G846"]},{"sq":8,"T":"filhos","tC":"v","rL":["G5043"]},{"sq":9,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":10,"T":"a ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":11,"T":"quem ","tC":"v","rL":["G3739"]},{"sq":12,"T":"eu ","tC":"v","rL":["G1473"]},{"sq":13,"T":"amo ","tC":"v","rL":["G25","G5719"]},{"sq":14,"T":"na ","tC":"v","rL":["G1722"]},{"sq":15,"T":"verdade ","tC":"v","rL":["G225"]},{"sq":16,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":17,"T":"não ","tC":"v","rL":["G3756"]},{"sq":18,"T":"somente ","tC":"v","rL":["G3441"]},{"sq":19,"T":"eu","tC":"v","rL":["G1473"]},{"sq":20,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":21,"T":"mas ","tC":"v","rL":["G235"]},{"sq":22,"T":"também ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":23,"T":"todos ","tC":"v","rL":["G3956"]},{"sq":24,"T":"os ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":25,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":26,"T":"conhecem ","tC":"v","rL":["G1097","G5761"]},{"sq":27,"T":"a ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":28,"T":"verdade","tC":"v","rL":["G225"]},{"sq":29,"T":", ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'O presbítero à senhora eleita e aos seus filhos, a quem eu amo na verdade e não somente eu, mas também todos os que conhecem a verdade,' 
            where verse.id_book = 63 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 1
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"por ","tC":"v","rL":["G1223"]},{"sq":1,"T":"causa ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":2,"T":"da ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":3,"T":"verdade ","tC":"v","rL":["G225"]},{"sq":4,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":["G3588"]},{"sq":5,"T":"permanece ","tC":"v","rL":["G3306","G5723"]},{"sq":6,"T":"em ","tC":"v","rL":["G1722"]},{"sq":7,"T":"nós ","tC":"v","rL":["G2254"]},{"sq":8,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":9,"T":"conosco ","tC":"v","rL":["G3326","G2257"]},{"sq":10,"T":"estará ","tC":"v","rL":["G2071","G5704"]},{"sq":11,"T":"para ","tC":"v","rL":["G1519"]},{"sq":12,"T":"sempre","tC":"v","rL":["G165"]},{"sq":13,"T":", ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'por causa da verdade que permanece em nós e conosco estará para sempre,' 
            where verse.id_book = 63 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 2
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Fiquei ","tC":"v","rL":["G5463"]},{"sq":1,"T":"sobremodo ","tC":"v","rL":["G3029"]},{"sq":2,"T":"alegre ","tC":"v","rL":["G5463","G5644"]},{"sq":3,"T":"em ","tC":"v","rL":["G3754"]},{"sq":4,"T":"ter ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":5,"T":"encontrado ","tC":"v","rL":["G2147","G5758"]},{"sq":6,"T":"dentre ","tC":"v","rL":["G1537"]},{"sq":7,"T":"os ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":8,"T":"teus ","tC":"v","rL":["G4675"]},{"sq":9,"T":"filhos ","tC":"v","rL":["G5043"]},{"sq":10,"T":"os ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":11,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":12,"T":"andam ","tC":"v","rL":["G4043","G5723"]},{"sq":13,"T":"na ","tC":"v","rL":["G1722"]},{"sq":14,"T":"verdade","tC":"v","rL":["G225"]},{"sq":15,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":16,"T":"de ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":17,"T":"acordo ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":18,"T":"com ","tC":"v","rL":["G2531"]},{"sq":19,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":20,"T":"mandamento ","tC":"v","rL":["G1785"]},{"sq":21,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":22,"T":"recebemos ","tC":"v","rL":["G2983","G5627"]},{"sq":23,"T":"da ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":24,"T":"parte ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":25,"T":"do ","tC":"v","rL":["G3844"]},{"sq":26,"T":"Pai","tC":"v","rL":["G3962"]},{"sq":27,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Fiquei sobremodo alegre em ter encontrado dentre os teus filhos os que andam na verdade, de acordo com o mandamento que recebemos da parte do Pai.' 
            where verse.id_book = 63 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 4
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"E ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"],"pr":true},{"sq":1,"T":"agora","tC":"v","rL":["G3568"]},{"sq":2,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":3,"T":"senhora","tC":"v","rL":["G2959"]},{"sq":4,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":5,"T":"peço-te","tC":"v","rL":["G2065","G5719","G4571"]},{"sq":6,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":7,"T":"não ","tC":"v","rL":["G3756"]},{"sq":8,"T":"como ","tC":"v","rL":["G5613"]},{"sq":9,"T":"se ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":10,"T":"escrevesse ","tC":"v","rL":["G1125","G5719","G5625","G1125","G5723"]},{"sq":11,"T":"mandamento ","tC":"v","rL":["G1785"]},{"sq":12,"T":"novo","tC":"v","rL":["G2537","G4671"]},{"sq":13,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":14,"T":"senão ","tC":"v","rL":["G235"]},{"sq":15,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":16,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":["G3739"]},{"sq":17,"T":"tivemos ","tC":"v","rL":["G2192","G5707"]},{"sq":18,"T":"desde ","tC":"v","rL":["G575"]},{"sq":19,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":20,"T":"princípio","tC":"v","rL":["G746"]},{"sq":21,"T":": ","tC":"v"},{"sq":22,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":["G2443"]},{"sq":23,"T":"nos ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":24,"T":"amemos ","tC":"v","rL":["G25","G5725"]},{"sq":25,"T":"uns ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":26,"T":"aos ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":27,"T":"outros","tC":"v","rL":["G240"]},{"sq":28,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'E agora, senhora, peço-te, não como se escrevesse mandamento novo, senão o que tivemos desde o princípio: que nos amemos uns aos outros.' 
            where verse.id_book = 63 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 5
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"E ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":1,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":2,"T":"amor ","tC":"v","rL":["G26"]},{"sq":3,"T":"é ","tC":"v","rL":["G2076","G5748"]},{"sq":4,"T":"este","tC":"v","rL":["G3778"]},{"sq":5,"T":": ","tC":"v"},{"sq":6,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":["G2443"]},{"sq":7,"T":"andemos ","tC":"v","rL":["G4043","G5725"]},{"sq":8,"T":"segundo ","tC":"v","rL":["G2596"]},{"sq":9,"T":"os ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":10,"T":"seus ","tC":"v","rL":["G846"]},{"sq":11,"T":"mandamentos","tC":"v","rL":["G1785"]},{"sq":12,"T":". ","tC":"v"},{"sq":13,"T":"Este ","tC":"v","rL":["G3778"]},{"sq":14,"T":"mandamento","tC":"v","rL":["G1785"]},{"sq":15,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":16,"T":"como ","tC":"v","rL":["G2531"]},{"sq":17,"T":"ouvistes ","tC":"v","rL":["G191","G5656"]},{"sq":18,"T":"desde ","tC":"v","rL":["G575"]},{"sq":19,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":20,"T":"princípio","tC":"v","rL":["G746"]},{"sq":21,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":22,"T":"é ","tC":"v","rL":["G2076","G5748"]},{"sq":23,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":["G2443"]},{"sq":24,"T":"andeis ","tC":"v","rL":["G4043","G5725"]},{"sq":25,"T":"nesse ","tC":"v","rL":["G1722","G846"]},{"sq":26,"T":" amor.","tC":"v","rL":[]}]',  content_with_out_format = 'E o amor é este: que andemos segundo os seus mandamentos. Este mandamento, como ouvistes desde o princípio, é que andeis nesse amor.' 
            where verse.id_book = 63 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 6
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Porque ","tC":"v","rL":["G3754"],"pr":true},{"sq":1,"T":"muitos ","tC":"v","rL":["G4183"]},{"sq":2,"T":"enganadores ","tC":"v","rL":["G4108"]},{"sq":3,"T":"têm ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":4,"T":"saído ","tC":"v","rL":["G1525","G5627"]},{"sq":5,"T":"pelo ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":6,"T":"mundo ","tC":"v","rL":["G2889"]},{"sq":7,"T":"fora","tC":"v","rL":["G1519"]},{"sq":8,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":9,"T":"os ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":10,"T":"quais ","tC":"v","rL":["G3588"]},{"sq":11,"T":"não ","tC":"v","rL":["G3361"]},{"sq":12,"T":"confessam ","tC":"v","rL":["G3670","G5723"]},{"sq":13,"T":"Jesus ","tC":"v","rL":["G2424"]},{"sq":14,"T":"Cristo ","tC":"v","rL":["G5547"]},{"sq":15,"T":"vindo ","tC":"v","rL":["G2064","G5740"]},{"sq":16,"T":"em ","tC":"v","rL":["G1722"]},{"sq":17,"T":"carne","tC":"v","rL":["G4561"]},{"sq":18,"T":"; ","tC":"v"},{"sq":19,"T":"assim ","tC":"v","rL":["G3778"]},{"sq":20,"T":"é ","tC":"v","rL":["G2076","G5748"]},{"sq":21,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":22,"T":"enganador ","tC":"v","rL":["G4108"]},{"sq":23,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":24,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":25,"T":"anticristo","tC":"v","rL":["G500"]},{"sq":26,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Porque muitos enganadores têm saído pelo mundo fora, os quais não confessam Jesus Cristo vindo em carne; assim é o enganador e o anticristo.' 
            where verse.id_book = 63 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 7
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Acautelai-vos","tC":"v","rL":["G991","G5720","G1438"]},{"sq":1,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":2,"T":"para ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":3,"T":"não ","tC":"v","rL":["G3363"]},{"sq":4,"T":"perderdes ","tC":"v","rL":["G622","G5661"]},{"sq":5,"T":"aquilo ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":6,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":["G3739"]},{"sq":7,"T":"temos ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":8,"T":"realizado ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":9,"T":"com ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":10,"T":"esforço","tC":"v","rL":["G2038","G5662"]},{"sq":11,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":12,"T":"mas ","tC":"v","rL":["G235"]},{"sq":13,"T":"para ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":14,"T":"receberdes ","tC":"v","rL":["G618","G5632"]},{"sq":15,"T":"completo ","tC":"v","rL":["G4134"]},{"sq":16,"T":"galardão","tC":"v","rL":["G3408"]},{"sq":17,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Acautelai-vos, para não perderdes aquilo que temos realizado com esforço, mas para receberdes completo galardão.' 
            where verse.id_book = 63 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 8
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Todo ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":1,"T":"aquele ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":2,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":["G3956"]},{"sq":3,"T":"ultrapassa ","tC":"v","rL":["G3845","G5723"]},{"sq":4,"T":"a ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":5,"T":"doutrina ","tC":"v","rL":["G1322"]},{"sq":6,"T":"de ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":7,"T":"Cristo ","tC":"v","rL":["G5547"]},{"sq":8,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":9,"T":"nela ","tC":"v","rL":["G1722"]},{"sq":10,"T":"não ","tC":"v","rL":["G3361"]},{"sq":11,"T":"permanece ","tC":"v","rL":["G3306","G5723"]},{"sq":12,"T":"não ","tC":"v","rL":["G3756"]},{"sq":13,"T":"tem ","tC":"v","rL":["G2192","G5719"]},{"sq":14,"T":"Deus","tC":"v","rL":["G2316"]},{"sq":15,"T":"; ","tC":"v"},{"sq":16,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":17,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":18,"T":"permanece ","tC":"v","rL":["G3306","G5723"]},{"sq":19,"T":"na ","tC":"v","rL":["G1722"]},{"sq":20,"T":"doutrina","tC":"v","rL":["G1322"]},{"sq":21,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":22,"T":"esse ","tC":"v","rL":["G3778"]},{"sq":23,"T":"tem ","tC":"v","rL":["G2192","G5719"]},{"sq":24,"T":"tanto ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":25,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":26,"T":"Pai ","tC":"v","rL":["G3962"]},{"sq":27,"T":"como ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":28,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":29,"T":"Filho","tC":"v","rL":["G5207"]},{"sq":30,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Todo aquele que ultrapassa a doutrina de Cristo e nela não permanece não tem Deus; o que permanece na doutrina, esse tem tanto o Pai como o Filho.' 
            where verse.id_book = 63 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 9
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Se ","tC":"v","rL":[],"pr":true},{"sq":1,"T":"alguém ","tC":"v","rL":["G1536","G5100"]},{"sq":2,"T":"vem ","tC":"v","rL":["G2064","G5736"]},{"sq":3,"T":"ter ","tC":"v","rL":["G4314"]},{"sq":4,"T":"convosco ","tC":"v","rL":["G5209"]},{"sq":5,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":6,"T":"não ","tC":"v","rL":["G3756"]},{"sq":7,"T":"traz ","tC":"v","rL":["G5342","G5719"]},{"sq":8,"T":"esta ","tC":"v","rL":["G5026"]},{"sq":9,"T":"doutrina","tC":"v","rL":["G1322"]},{"sq":10,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":11,"T":"não ","tC":"v","rL":["G3361"]},{"sq":12,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":["G846"]},{"sq":13,"T":"recebais ","tC":"v","rL":["G2983","G5720"]},{"sq":14,"T":"em ","tC":"v","rL":["G1519"]},{"sq":15,"T":"casa","tC":"v","rL":["G3614"]},{"sq":16,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":17,"T":"nem ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532","G3361"]},{"sq":18,"T":"lhe ","tC":"v","rL":["G846"]},{"sq":19,"T":"deis ","tC":"v","rL":["G3004","G5720"]},{"sq":20,"T":"as ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":21,"T":"boas-vindas","tC":"v","rL":["G5463","G5721"]},{"sq":22,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Se alguém vem ter convosco e não traz esta doutrina, não o recebais em casa, nem lhe deis as boas-vindas.' 
            where verse.id_book = 63 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 10
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Porquanto ","tC":"v","rL":["G1063"]},{"sq":1,"T":"aquele ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":2,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":3,"T":"lhe ","tC":"v","rL":["G846"]},{"sq":4,"T":"dá ","tC":"v","rL":["G3004","G5723"]},{"sq":5,"T":"boas-vindas ","tC":"v","rL":["G5463","G5721"]},{"sq":6,"T":"faz-se ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":7,"T":"cúmplice ","tC":"v","rL":["G2841","G5719"]},{"sq":8,"T":"das ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":9,"T":"suas ","tC":"v","rL":["G846"]},{"sq":10,"T":"obras ","tC":"v","rL":["G2041"]},{"sq":11,"T":"más","tC":"v","rL":["G4190"]},{"sq":12,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Porquanto aquele que lhe dá boas-vindas faz-se cúmplice das suas obras más.' 
            where verse.id_book = 63 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 11
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Os filhos da tua irmã eleita te saúdam.' 
            where verse.id_book = 63 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 13
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;
